The Department of Sociology at Groningen celebrated its [80-year existence](https://www.rug.nl/gmw/sociologie/80jaar/) and a big party was thrown showcasing the diversity of research at our Department through several presentation. This was my talk presenting all members from the [Families Lifecourse and Ageing Group](www.gertstulp.com/FLAG), which I am coordinating:
